name: Diane_Shapiro
text:
Diane Shapiro
For Cooper's secretary, see Diane Evans.
Diane Shapiro, PhD was the girlfriend of Deputy Tommy "Hawk" Hill.
By 1989, Shapiro received a PhD from Brandeis and Hawk had written her a poem:
One woman can make you fly like an eagle.Another can give you the strength of a lion.But only one in the cycle of life can fill your heart with wonder and the wisdomthat you have known a singular joy.
When asked on Twitter, Mark Frost confirmed that Hawk and Shapiro were still together as of 2016.
